arStrings.szText: All Elite enemies can convey {c_important}Hearts{/c} within this tunnel; an {c_important}outgrowth{/c} found within can summon a powerful Malignant enemy with the use of a {c_important}matching Invoker{/c}.
A new form of Lilith's corruption spreads across Sanctuary, and you must stop it! This unlocks {c_highlight}after Campaign completion{/c}.

A malignancy borne of Lilith's corruption spreads across Sanctuary. You must defeat this scourge, no matter the cost!

{c_highlight}{icon:bullet, 1}All new Questline & Boss:{/c} Discover the source of the Malignant.

{c_highlight}{icon:bullet, 1}32 new Malignant Powers:{/c} Cage the Malignant to enhance your Character's power.

{c_highlight}{icon:bullet, 1}All new Season Journey:{/c} Conquer 7 Chapters of challenges.

{c_highlight}{icon:bullet, 1}7 new Legendary Aspects & 6 new Unique Items:{/c} Explore new ways to build and play each Class.

{c_highlight}{icon:bullet, 1}All new Cosmetics:{/c} Acquire seasonally themed looks in the Battle Pass and other new looks in the Shop.
